article.title: Australian Navy Procures Transmitter Receivers
article.text: Lockheed Martin MS2, Owego, New York, has been awarded a maximum $10,271,439 firm-fixed-price contract for transmitter receivers. This is a four-year base contract with no option periods. Using service is Royal Australian Navy. The contracting activity is the Defense Logistics Agency Aviation, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania (SPRWA1-13-D-2000-THAX).
